release_note: Update Alert! Get ready for smoother sailing with our latest version. Bug fixes: We ve squashed pesky bugs to enhance performance. Exciting new features: Discover fresh functionalities for an even better user experience!
Upgrade today for a superior and seamless app experience! We ve implemented enhancements behind the scenes to elevate your overall user journey. Embrace the newest version and enjoy the benefits!

Our latest update is all about refining your experience. We ve squashed pesky bugs and made under the hood improvements for enhanced stability. Enjoy a smoother app experience and keep the feedback coming!

Dive into the latest Tiimo update! Packed with a fantastic new feature this release is not one to miss. So upgrade now for an even better Tiimo experience! We are constantly working to improve Tiimo and we sincerely appreciate your support on this journey. Thank you for staying with us!

This update addresses several minor bugs that may have been causing inconvenience and enhances overall stability. We appreciate your choice in using our application! Your feedback holds significance for us and we encourage you to share your thoughts. If you have any concerns or suggestions please don t hesitate to contact our support team. Thank you for updating!

Minor bug fixes

In honor of Dyslexia Awareness Week we re marking the occasion with a font enhancement! Do you happen to have any specific font choices in mind Your input is highly valued and we re eager to receive your suggestions. Our commitment to enhancing Tiimo remains unwavering and we genuinely thank you for accompanying us on this path. Stay tuned for forthcoming thrilling Tiimo updates!

We re celebrating Dyslexia Awareness Week with a font update! Do you have any other font preferences We would love to hear from you. We are constantly working to improve Tiimo and we sincerely appreciate your support on this journey. Keep an eye out for more exciting updates from Tiimo!
Just another update to fix some bugs. Woohoo! At Tiimo we are constantly working hard to improve our app and make it the best it can be. Thank you for sticking with us and for your continued support!

We re excited to bring you the latest update of Tiimo! In this version we ve made some improvements and bug fixes to enhance your user experience. Here are some of the key changes: You can now customise your imported calendar events with color and icons without unlinking just like the rest of your activities. Bug fixes: Resolved a bug where removing a tag from an activity would not actually remove it We re always striving to improve our app and your support has been invaluable in making this happen. Please keep an eye out for more exciting updates from us soon. Until then happy scheduling!

We re excited to bring you the latest update of Tiimo! In this version we ve made some improvements and bug fixes to enhance your user experience. Here are some of the key changes: You can now mark your imported calendar events as done just like the rest of your activities. Access our new podcast Changemakers by Tiimo from the Me section. Bug fixes: Resolved a bug in the Explore section where activities in other languages were not showing up in search results. Addressed an issue where strokes on My Day would sometimes appear. You can now access your existing routines by long pressing the button on My Day. We re always striving to improve our app and your support has been invaluable in making this happen. Please keep an eye out for more exciting updates from us soon. Until then happy scheduling!

Hello! We ve fixed some bugs to improve your experience with the app. We re constantly working to improve Tiimo and we greatly appreciate your support. Keep an eye out for more updates coming soon and until then happy scheduling!

Hello! Yup that s Hello in Japanese! We have updated our app with new languages and improved the localization of several others. We hope to make it a better experience for all our users. We are always striving to improve our app and your support has been invaluable in making this happen. Be on the lookout for more exciting updates from us soon!

Hey there! We ve got some great news to share with you. We just launched our new and rebranded signup flow and we are over the moon about it! We re constantly working hard to make our planning tool better and better and we couldn t have done it without your support. Thank you so much for sticking with us! Stay tuned for even more exciting updates from Tiimo!
Just another update to get rid of some bugs. Woohoo! At Tiimo we always work hard to make our planning tool the best possible. Thank you for sticking with us and your continued support!

We ve been hunting down bugs lately so here s another update that takes care of them. We re always striving to improve Tiimo and make it the best planning tool available. Thank you for your continued support!

Hey you all! This is just a minor update to Tiimo that fixes an annoying bug. We appreciate all the feedback and suggestions you ve given us as we work hard to make Tiimo even better. We hope this update will be useful for all your planning needs. Thanks for being a part of the Tiimo community!

Hey y all! We just wanted to let you know that we ve made a minor update to fix a bug in our app. We really appreciate your feedback and suggestions as we work to enhance Tiimo. We hope you find it helpful for all your planning needs!

Hey there! How s it going We re here to spread some awesome news! Since our last update we ve been working hard to make Tiimo even better for you. New: We ve added a new feature that allows you to delegate the task breakdown to our AI assistant so you can focus on the bigger picture. We ve added some really cool widgets that pop up when you complete all your scheduled tasks. Your notes will now sync across all your devices! Bug fixes: We ve also fixed a bug that caused you to get logged out. We re really sorry for causing any issues associated with this. We re always here to listen to your feedback. We want to make Tiimo the best planning app out there and your ideas and suggestions help us do just that. So don t hesitate to reach out to us with your thoughts. We hope you have a fantastic day planning with Tiimo!

Hey y all! Just a minor update to fix a bug that hopefully improves your experience. We value your feedback as we continue to enhance our app and welcome any suggestions you may have. We hope that Tiimo proves useful for all your planning needs.

Hey y all! Just a minor update to fix a bug that hopefully improves your experience. We value your feedback as we continue to enhance our app and welcome any suggestions you may have. We hope that Tiimo proves useful for all your planning needs.

Greetings everyone! We have released a minor update to fix a bug and enhance your experience. We appreciate your feedback and welcome any suggestions you may have to further improve our app. We hope Tiimo proves to be a useful tool for all your planning needs.

Hey hey! How s it going We re back with the latest and greatest version of Tiimo and we ve got some seriously cool new stuff to share with you! New: We ve added a fresh new animation to the Right Now screen that ll have you grooving in no time. We really hope you dig it! We ve also added some brand new app icons just in time for Pride. You can find them in your Tiimo settings. And if that wasn t enough we ve squashed some pesky little bugs too. We re stoked to release these updates and hear what you think. Your feedback is super important to us because it helps shape the future of Tiimo. So don t be shy let us know your thoughts! We hope you ll keep using Tiimo for all your planning needs and have a blast doing it!

Greetings! We have released a minor update to address a bug that was causing issues. We appreciate your input as we work to improve our app and are open to any suggestions you may have. Our goal is to ensure that Tiimo meets all of your planning needs and proves to be a valuable tool for you.

Good news everyone! We ve squashed a pesky bug that was causing mischief in the app. Now you can enjoy a smoother experience without any unwanted visitors. We appreciate your feedback as we work to enhance our app. Your suggestions are highly valued so please do not hesitate to share your opinions with us. We hope you find Tiimo useful for all of your planning requirements.

Good news everyone! We ve squashed a pesky bug that was causing mischief in the app. Now you can enjoy a smoother experience without any unwanted visitors. Hello again! How are you doing We have some exciting news to share with you! Since our last release we ve fixed some bugs and added new sun and moon animations. New: We ve added new animations to the Right Now and My Day pages! We re very excited about them and you ll get to see them when you ve nothing scheduled completed your day or are about to. We hope you like them! Bug fixes: The keyboard on checklists will no longer hide the input field making it easier to type. We ve also fixed a similar bug with our Notes feature. We ve also fixed some UI bugs on the iPad. We can t wait to hear your thoughts and feedback as we continue to improve Tiimo. Your ideas and suggestions are highly valued and help us shape the future of our app. Please don t hesitate to reach out to us and share your ideas. We hope you enjoy using Tiimo for all your planning needs and have a wonderful day!

All right! We re back with a fresh version for you all! This version includes stability improvements to help make your experience more enjoyable and productive. We really appreciate your feedback and ideas as they help shape the future of our app. Please don t hesitate to share your thoughts with us. We hope you have a great time using Tiimo for all your planning needs.

Are you ready for some pretty cool new stuff This time we re excited to announce some features we ve been looking forward to releasing! New: Tiimo now supports Live Activities for all of your to do anytime activities and routines allowing you to easily view your plans at a glance. We re also sprucing up your schedule with some nice animations whenever you complete an activity or checklist! Yay! We re thrilled to release this new feature and value your feedback as we continue to improve our app! Your ideas are incredibly important to us as they help shape the future of our app. Please don t hesitate to share your thoughts with us. We hope you enjoy using Tiimo for all your planning needs!

Tiimo is back with a brand new version and we have an exciting new update for you. New: We are glad to announce that the visual progress bar from the rectangular complication is now available again! This time it can be used on both your lock screen and your watch. We highly value your feedback and ideas as they play a crucial role in shaping the future of our app. Please feel free to share your thoughts with us. We hope you enjoy using Tiimo for all your planning needs!

All right! We re back with a fresh version for you all! This version includes stability improvements to help make your experience more enjoyable and productive. We really appreciate your feedback and ideas as they help shape the future of our app. Please don t hesitate to share your thoughts with us. We hope you have a great time using Tiimo for all your planning needs.

Tiimo is back with a brand new version and we have an exciting new update for our calendar import function. New: Tiimo is now suggesting an icon for you to add to your activities to make it a more fun and engaging experience. Yay! Spice up your imported calendar events with custom colors and icons! Say goodbye to app hopping and hello to editing your events directly in Tiimo. We are introducing a new all day event feature that makes it easier to identify events that last for an entire day. Bug fixes: We ve also made other improvements around the stability of the app and tweaked some text. We re always working hard to make Tiimo the best it can be and we couldn t do it without your feedback and support! So please keep letting us know what you think and don t forget to leave us a rating and review. Happy planning!

We appreciate your feedback and ideas as they are essential in shaping the future of Tiimo. So please don t hesitate to share your thoughts with us. Be sure to download the latest version of Tiimo today! If you re already a fan of our app we would be thrilled if you could leave us a rating and review. Your support means everything to us! Happy planning!

Tiimo is back with yet a brand new version. We have another exciting feature to announce! Our calendar import feature has been updated and we would love to hear your thoughts on it! New: Add some personality to your imported calendars with custom colors and icons! No more hopping between apps edit your calendar events directly in Tiimo. Plan your day and make it a breeze with our new all day event feature. Bug fixes: We ve fixed a small UI error on the Right Now screen when you re in dark mode. And other smaller ones! We re always working hard to bring you even more exciting features so stay tuned! And remember your feedback and ideas are essential to shaping the future of Tiimo. Don t be shy let us know what you think! Download the latest version now! Last but not least if you love Tiimo as much as we do please leave us a rating and review. Your support means the world to us! Happy planning!

Thank you for all your feedback! We value your feedback and ideas as they play an important role in shaping the future of Tiimo. So please don t hesitate to share your thoughts with us. Download the latest version of Tiimo now! And if you re a fan of our app we d be thrilled if you could leave us a rating and review. Your support means everything to us! Happy planning!

We hope you enjoyed our previous version which allows you to view the time you have available between your plans. We re excited to announce that Tiimo is back with a brand new version with a cool new addition. Download the latest version now and check it out! New: We ve introduced videos on the Me page so you can get to know Tiimo even better. We can t wait to hear your thoughts on it! Bug fixes: We ve fixed the issue with the time until midnight not being shown correctly. Sorry about that! We ve replaced a few error codes and other text strings are now displayed correctly. We re constantly working hard to bring you even more exciting features so keep an eye out! We truly value your feedback and ideas as they play an essential role in shaping the future of Tiimo. So please don t hesitate to share your thoughts with us! Also if you re as in love with Tiimo as we are we would be so grateful if you could leave us a rating and review. Your support means everything to us! Wishing you happy planning!

Get excited because Tiimo is back with a brand new version! We ve got some amazing news and a cool new feature to share with you. New: We ve made planning your day even more fun and easier with our new feature that helps you schedule tasks in your spare time. You can now add a quick timer between your plans to help you stay on track and get things done! Bug fixes: We ve updated the watch complications to new ones. They re improved. You won t be logged out of the app as often we ve got your back. We re always working hard to bring you even more exciting features so stay tuned! And remember your feedback and ideas are essential to shaping the future of Tiimo. Don t be shy let us know what you think! Last but not least if you love Tiimo as much as we do please leave us a rating and review. Your support means the world to us! Happy planning!

Exciting times! We have a brand new version of Tiimo ready for you. In this release you can expect to see a mix of bug fixes and other improvements. Bug fixes: Checklists won t be unchecking themselves anymore! No more frustrating surprises. Missing tags Not on our watch! They re back. Dark mode just got even cooler with the return of those time and date icons. Phew! Other improvements: Our error messages have been given a makeover to better inform you about what went wrong or just to make you smile . Design improvements on various dialogue pop ups. We ve got some exciting new features in the pipeline so stay tuned for more! And as always if you have any feedback or ideas we d love to hear from you. Your voice shapes the future of Tiimo so don t be shy! And finally if you love Tiimo as much as we do show us some love by leaving a rating and review. It would mean the world to us! Happy bug free using!

New: You asked and we delivered! This time we re launching a new feature that allows you to mark your planned activities as complete when you have completed them before the planned time. You ll also be able to reschedule them when they ve automatically completed themselves in case they have been set as completed without you doing them. Now you and your planned activities will always walk together hand in hand! We re working hard to make the app better all the time. We would love to hear from you if you have feedback or ideas. NEW FEATURE! We are so excited to launch a new way of making routines! Now it is easier to see build edit and repeat a collection of activities into a routine and place this in your daily schedule. The update contains: New App watch feature: Routines Visual Changes Library: Create Routines now appear in the Routine library section My Day: Routines appear in their own block which can be expanded to show more detail My Day: Routines can be planned or to do anytime Right now: Activities within the routine also show the name of the routine As routines now have their own duration they can be planned to start at a set time or they can be flexible to be started at any time. You can also pause your routine and restart it when it suits you. Visually routines look different to other activities so you can see them more clearly in your My Day view. At a glance you can see the activity that you have on now and the one that is coming next. Other cool features include being able to check off activities in your routine if you complete them early and being able to edit your routine on a particular day without it affecting your template routine in the library. It is also easier to build your own routines with activity suggestions. Thank you so much for all the support and feedback that you give us. Your ideas and comments really go a long way into shaping the app and in the design of new features like this. A special thanks to everyone helping us test and finalise the feature. PS. If you like our app please don t hesitate to rate and review us. It means the world to us!

New: More independent WatchOS app including log in switch profile and log out. It means you can now log into different profiles on different watches and you can use Tiimo easier as a family. If you use Tiimo for yourself and you log in to your account on the phone you are still automatically logged in on the watch as you. Bug fixes: Bug fix: calendar import now show on the watchOS again Bug fix: with deleted imported activities Bug fix: minor layout bug on widget checklist Bug fix: App crashing when selecting certain icons Bug fix: Widget now dont tell if you are done with the day if you still have scheduled plans We re working hard to make the app better all the time. We have many great features coming very soon. Next up is a new and improved routine feature. Stay tuned! If you have feedback or ideas we would love to hear form you. We read and listen to all of them and your feedback shape the roadmap. P.S. if you like our app please don t hesitate to rate and review us. It means the world to us!

This update includes: New: More independent WatchOS app including log in switch profile and log out. It means you can now log into different profiles on different watches and you can use Tiimo easier as a family. If you use Tiimo for yourself and you log in to your account on the phone you are still automatically logged in on the watch as before . Bug fixes: Bug fix: calendar import now show on the watchOS again Bug fix: minor layout bug on widget checklist We re working hard to make the app better all the time. We have many great features coming very soon. Next up is a new and improved routine feature. Stay tuned! If you have feedback or ideas we would love to hear form you. Welcome to all the new users! This update includes: Improved create user experience. More user friendly error messages. Fixing bug on iPad split screen. We are so proud and excited to announce that Apple is featuring Tiimo as One to Watch globally across the App Store and apple.com. We re working hard to make the app better all the time. We have many great features coming very soon. Next up is a new and improved routine feature. Stay tuned! Thanks for all your feedback and ideas! We read and listen to all of them. P.S. if you like our app please don t hesitate to rate and review us. It means the world to us!

Dear wonderful Tiimo users! Thank you for all the kind words you re passing along to us through customer support reviews and on social media. It means so much to us hearing from you! Thank you for reaching out regarding issues you re experiencing as well. We re working as fast as we can to make the app better. Stay tuned! This update contains: New: re ordering flexible activities. Now you can decide on the order of your activities To do anytime by dragging and dropping. New: soft deletion of activities. This means when you delete an activity from your schedule it will still appear in your library to be used another time. New: Japanese version of the app is out!  Hi! . New: added the option to play resume restart by swiping left on an activity. Fixed: two bugs in widgets. Fixed: bug for checking unchecking checklist items. Thanks for all your feedback and ideas! We read and listen to all of them. We have so many great features coming very soon. Next being a new and improved routine system. So stay tuned! P.S. if you like our app please don t hesitate to rate and review us. It means the world to us!

The update contains: New app watch feature: flexible activities Visual changes My day: To do anytime Planned activities My day: Re design of activity cards Right now: supporting multiple ongoing activities It s no exaggeration that we have been looking SO MUCH forward to sharing this release with you! A lot of hard work love and tears have been put into this new feature. Today we are launching flexible activities in Tiimo. It means you can now make activities with a duration and simply press start now when it fits you. You can also pause flexible activities and start them again when it fits. Dont worry you can still use tiimo exactly like you did before planning activities in a timed schedule. But now you have the option to not set a specific time for certain activities as well! It means you can have many activities ongoing at the same time. That is why we have added a little thumbnail for Right now of your ongoing activities so you can switch in focus between different activities. We ve made some visual changes to the activity card in My Day as well. Icons are moved to the right side so that you quickly browse through your day visually with activities and checklist items. Thanks for all your feedback and ideas! We read and listen to all of them. We have so many great features coming very soon. Next being a new and improved routine system and more usability updates. So stay tuned! P.S. if you like our app please don t hesitate to rate and review us. It means the world to us!

Home screen widgets are here! So many of you have requested this feature and we are beyond excited to finally be able to share this with all of you wonderful users. It required a lot of work that is too boring and behind the scenes to dig too much into but we ve restructured developed and tested x 1000 and we really hope you like the result. Next big focus is activities with duration as well as calendar integrations. Stay tuned! If you like our app please don t hesitate to rate or review us. It truly means a lot to us! What s new: Small widget: Always know what s in your schedule now or what is coming next! Medium widget: Gives a great overview of your checklist! Always know what s in your schedule now or what is coming next.

New Create Activity Experience In the last 3 weeks we have worked intensely on redesigning the entire way of creating and editing activities. Our mission is clear: we want you to have a better and faster user experience creating activities so that you can use your time and energy to get though your daily plans. We are now happy to share: a new way of creating and editing an activity new and updated icons and the ones you have requested! the possibility to add custom colors iOS 14 only a new way of presenting overlapping activities Now we will continue to work on creating flexible activities with only a duration so that you can start them whenever it fits into your plans. P.S. if you like our app please don t hesitate to rate and review us. It means the world to us!
